body_html: Verify that you have CUDA 9.0 installed and not some other version. TF is very specific about which version of CUDA and CUDNN it wants. Can you confirm that you actually have a file called libcublas.so.9.0 in /usr/local/cuda/lib64?
body_text: Verify that you have CUDA 9.0 installed and not some other version. TF is very specific about which version of CUDA and CUDNN it wants. Can you confirm that you actually have a file called libcublas.so.9.0 in /usr/local/cuda/lib64?
body: Verify that you have CUDA 9.0 installed and not some other version. TF is very specific about which version of CUDA and CUDNN it wants. Can you confirm that you actually have a file called libcublas.so.9.0 in /usr/local/cuda/lib64?
